kanji-cam.name: Kanji Cam
kanji-cam.info: Kanji Cam is a fun and effortless way to learn Japanese kanji by simply taking pictures. Kanji Cam handles the chore of creating and sorting flashcards so you can focus on your Japanese learning goals. Kanji are scanned via OCR using a custom UI frontend built around Tesseract.js.

caravana.name: Caravana
caravana.info: Caravana is a full-stack marketplace app allowing users to rent-out or reserve recreational vehicles. Developed as a project at Le Wagon Coding Bootcamp.
